Server

Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.DB

  • public class DB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class capable of establishing connection with database, sending sql requests and returning values retrieved from DB

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Establishes connection with DB

        Function tries 3 times to connect with DB. Credentials hardcoded, pls don't mess with db.

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when cannot establish

        public java.util.ArrayList<Meme> getAll()
                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieve all memes from database
        Returns:
        ArrayList of memes
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when connecting to database or executing query fails

      • signIn

        public java.lang.String signIn(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String passwd)
        Sign in with given credentials

        Function tests if given credentials are identical with credentials in database. Given password and password in database are in plaintext because security.

        Parameters:
        username -
        passwd -
        Returns:
        logged user pseudonym if signing was successful null otherwise

        passwd -
        autisticpseudo -
        Returns:
        true if creating account was successful false otherwise

        Retrieve stats about given user from database
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • rateMeme

        public boolean rateMeme(java.lang.String username,
                        int memeID)
        Insert record to userratings table representing meme's upvote
        Parameters:
        username - username of user who upvoted meme
        memeID - ID of upvoted meme
        Returns:
